attributes.title: Meh
attributes.review: Gotta say i’m not too impressed with the formation or creation of this app. This is the most poorly mad app i’ve ever used. Just over all disappointing and insulting 🧚🌻🦋

attributes.title: Ads
attributes.review: I loved the app but there is so many ads that pop up, like I don’t really like Donald Trump. There is no flavor of what I should with my money here.

attributes.title: Tik tok
attributes.review: The app is just bad I was using it for 1 week and it made my phone slow and the app kept crashing

attributes.title: Worst app ever🤮🤮🤮🤢
attributes.review: it honestly doesn’t even deserve to exists 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮 has a terrible platform run by a strange orange creature with horrible disgusting racist, sexist, homophobic and overall a disgraceful morals 🤢 don’t download ever

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up with the campaign and it gave my phone a virus and my phone wouldn’t turn on! DO NOT RECOMMEND!!

attributes.title: trumpy app
attributes.review: this app was insanely slow. internet wise and information wise, i did not at all like it. 10/10 would not reccomend. now gen z is either gonna take ur app away too or we just leave tik tok n call it a day bc trust me hun, if the rallies didn’t teach you enough, we will mess with you in every aspect. good luck (:

attributes.title: ✨🧸Tik Tok🧸✨
attributes.review: So listen up trump ur gonna regret taking down tik tok bc were gonna get our revenge and hr gonna want to get tik tok on the App Store again so don’t take it down little ✨orange✨ it’s a ⚠️ Warning⚠️

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: I’m sorry but this app was just so bad, why would anyone make this it needs to be taken down ASAP

attributes.title: So bad
attributes.review: I thought I was going to be informed about our great nation, but this is full of liberal propaganda! I’m going back to Facebook where all the sane people are.
